WorkItem.Description:
Is there any plans for adding custom skins support on the Android version?
I would like to be able to create a more compact layout for smaller screens.

Comments.Message:
you can already do this, grap the for instance TI-82.png and ti-82keymap.png from the .apk (simply unzip), modify it with a picture editor to fit your layout and repack it nto the .apk. After that you have to repack and signing the .apk:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10156278/can-an-apk-be-repacked-after-a-minor-text-edit

HTH
